author: John MacFarlane
title: Montreal, Quebec City transit agencies reduce services as ridership plummets
description: With Metro and bus traffic down 75 to 80 per cent due to the COVID-19 outbreak, public transit agencies in Montreal and Quebec City will strategically reduce service, starting March 30.
content:
With ridership dwindling due to the COVID-19 outbreak, the public transit agencies in Montreal and Quebec City will strategically reduce services starting March 30.
